definitions.definition: Pertaining to the nucleus of an atom .
Involving energy released by nuclear reactions ( fission , fusion , radioactive decay ).
Relating to a weapon that derives its force from rapid release of energy through nuclear reactions.
Involving an extreme course of action, or one with severe consequences.
definitions.label_groups: by extension , figurative , of a solution or response

definitions.definition: Pertaining to the nucleus of a cell .
Pertaining to a centre around which something is developed or organised; central , pivotal .
examples: Nuclear Polynesian languages include Hawaiian and Samoan.

definitions.definition: Relating to, being of, or comprising the nuclear family .

main_definition: Pertaining to the nucleus of an atom . [from 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: Involving energy released by nuclear reactions ( fission , fusion , radioactive decay ). [from 20th c.]
Relating to a weapon that derives its force from rapid release of energy through nuclear reactions. [from 20th c.]
( by extension , figurative , of a solution or response ) Involving an extreme course of action, or one with severe consequences.
( biology ) Pertaining to the nucleus of a cell . [from 19th c.]
( archaic ) Pertaining to a centre around which something is developed or organised; central , pivotal . [from 19th c.]
Relating to, being of, or comprising the nuclear family .
